title: VR, the Metaverse, and Barriers to Entry
itunes:title: VR, the Metaverse, and Barriers to Entry
description:
In this episode, we look at some of the issues with VR that could act as a stumbling block on the journey to the metaverse. How will VR play a part in the metaverse, and will it create a new and more dramatic digital divide?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: metaverse, virtual reality, VR, mixed reality, XR, augmented reality, AR, Oculus, Rift, Quest, Go, Facebook, Meta, Palmer Luckey, Mark Zucerkberg, cybersickness, Dactyl Nightmare
